微妙: (bimyou) - subtle, delicate, fine; difficult, complex, tricky, delicate (situação, posição, etc.), close (e.g. decision) , subtle, delicate, fine; difficult, complex, tricky, delicate (situation, position, etc.), close (e.g. decision); doubtful, questionable, dicey; not great, iffy
